name: Luxembourg Institute of Health Research Portal
description: The LIH Research Portal allows you to search and find information about all active researchers, units, outputs (publications), projects (since 2015), infrastructures, and more, to get an overview of LIH research or to find details for contact or collaboration. The institute specializes in patient-centric translational research with a focus on cancer and immune-related disorders, using advanced technology on patient-derived disease models and real-world data.
